sl: Sem Doris Einfalt, slovenska umetnica, ki ustvarja predvsem za otroke. Moje delo obsega stenske poslikave, ilustracije otroških slikanic in umetniške delavnice.
Moja strast do ustvarjanja se je začela že v otroštvu, ko sem preživljala ure ob risanju in slikanju. Danes to strast prenašam na mlajše generacije skozi delavnice in ilustracije.
Vsaka moja stvaritev nosi delček otroške radovednosti in čarobnosti, ki jo želim deliti z vsemi.
en: I am Doris Einfalt, a Slovenian artist who creates primarily for children. My work includes wall paintings, children's book illustrations, and art workshops.
My passion for creating began in childhood, when I spent hours drawing and painting. Today, I pass this passion on to younger generations through workshops and illustrations.
Each of my creations carries a piece of childlike curiosity and magic that I wish to share with everyone.
